body_html:
You should have one graph that is a training graph built with create_training_graph. Then you should create a separate graph that is the corresponding eval graph (just the forward pass, no gradients) that you should create with create_eval_graph.

Then you should freeze the graph with the freeze_graph tool and provide to tflite_convert.
body_text:
You should have one graph that is a training graph built with create_training_graph. Then you should create a separate graph that is the corresponding eval graph (just the forward pass, no gradients) that you should create with create_eval_graph.
Then you should freeze the graph with the freeze_graph tool and provide to tflite_convert.
body:
You should have one graph that is a training graph built with create_training_graph. Then you should create a separate graph that is the corresponding eval graph (just the forward pass, no gradients) that you should create with create_eval_graph.

Then you should freeze the graph with the freeze_graph tool and provide to tflite_convert.
